original_title: VeggieTales: Moe and the Big Exit
overview: Moe is a good-natured cowboy living high on the hog out in Dodgeball City while his kinfolk work their fingers to the bone digging the Grand Canyon. When Moe asks the heartless mayor to let his people go, he refuses and a heap of trouble comes to town! Can Moe help free his people from the bondage and flee Dodgeball City once and for all?
title: VeggieTales: Moe and the Big Exit
